reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 221/04: DISSOLUTION OF ST. MICHAEL'S HOSPITAL CROWN FOUNDATION
reg_info.reg_name_text: DISSOLUTION OF ST. MICHAEL’S HOSPITAL CROWN FOUNDATION
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 221/04: DISSOLUTION OF ST. MICHAEL'S HOSPITAL CROWN FOUNDATION
reg_info.act_under: Crown Foundations Act, 1996   Loi de 1996 sur les fondations de la Couronne

content.content: 1. The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “St. Michael’s Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 221/04, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “St. Michael’s Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 221/04, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Upon the dissolution of the “St. Michael’s Hospital Crown Foundation” under section 1, the assets of the foundation become the assets of the St. Michael’s Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 221/04, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Upon the dissolution of the “St. Michael’s Hospital Crown Foundation” under section 1, the assets of the foundation become the assets of the St. Michael’s Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 221/04, s. 2.
